pages.text: Rituals are performed using a ritual table to hold the transmutable item.

pages.title: Salt
pages.text: Salt has to be placed on the ground on each side of the Ritual Table with a 1-block distance.$(br2)The recipe items have to be placed on top of the salt block with a right-click.

pages.title: Ritual Table
pages.text: The item in the middle must be placed on the Ritual Table, and the others on the Salt Block.

pages.title: Ritual Activation
pages.text: Once all the items are placed on its necessary blocks, right-clicking the Ritual Table with a $(#b4a7d6)Hex Focus$() starts the ritual process.
